q: Although he tried to debunk the idea in Thursday's interview, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies. I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped, said Ken Auletta , author of "Googled: The End of the World As We Know It." "I think Eric Schmidt is burned out." Hamilton, the sixth-leading scorer in franchise history, has spent 13 of the past 14 games on the inactive list. That's kind of hard for me to imagine, Antonio McDyess said. As Detroit continues the long reconstruction project, which began in 2008 when general manager Joe Dumars dealt Chauncey Billups to Denver in a deal for Allen Iverson , Antonio McDyess is girding for another title.
